titleParagraph.title: Log in
titleParagraph.paragraph: Create your ideal diet, easy and fast

titleParagraph.title: Sign up for free
titleParagraph.paragraph: Start your journey toward a healthier life today.

register.passwordDetails: Your password must be at least 8 characters long and include an uppercase letter, a lowercase letter, a number, and a special character

titleParagraph.title: Forgot your password?
titleParagraph.paragraph: Enter your email to receive a recovery code

titleParagraph.title: Verify code
titleParagraph.paragraph: Enter the 6-digit code we sent to

titleParagraph.title: New password
titleParagraph.paragraph: Set a new password for your account

titleParagraph.title: Welcome to FastDiet!
titleParagraph.paragraph: Start by creating your profile to enjoy a personalized experience

titleParagraph.title: Select your diet type
titleParagraph.paragraph: Choose your eating style. If you don't follow a specific diet, select 'Balanced'

titleParagraph.title: What cuisines do you like?
titleParagraph.paragraph: Select the types of cuisine you prefer to include in your diet

titleParagraph.title: Do you have any intolerances?
titleParagraph.paragraph: Select the food you want to avoid in your meal plans

errorsBackend.userNotVerified: User not verified. Please check your email
errorsBackend.emailSendError: Error sending email. Please try again
errorsBackend.verifyEmailBeforeReset: You must verify your email before resetting the password
errorsBackend.timeoutError: The request is taking too long
errorsBackend.serverError: Server error. Please try again later

errorsFrontend.selectCuisine: Please choose at least one type of cuisine
errorsFrontend.selectDiet: Please choose a type of diet

validations.emptyUserid: Please enter your username or email
validations.usernameLength: Username must be between 3 and 20 characters.
validations.usernameInvalidChars: Username can only contain letters, numbers, underscores, and hyphens.
validations.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters long
validations.passwordUppercase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
validations.passwordLowercase: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter
validations.passwordDigit: Password must contain at least one number
validations.passwordSpecialChar: Password must contain at least one special character
validations.nameLength: Name must be between 3 and 50 characters.
